title: I cannot initialize Tensor. (They will become torch.autograd.variable.Variable)
body_html:
• OS: Linux
  • PyTorch version: torch-0.4.0a0+a58f2d2
  • How you installed PyTorch (conda, pip, source): source
  • Python version: 3.5.2
  • CUDA/cuDNN version: 9.0

Following code for reproducing:

ipdb> torch.FloatTensor([0])
0
[torch.FloatTensor of size (1,)]

ipdb> type(torch.FloatTensor([0]))
<class 'torch.autograd.variable.Variable'>

body:

- PyTorch version: torch-0.4.0a0+a58f2d2
- How you installed PyTorch (conda, pip, source): source
- Python version: 3.5.2
- CUDA/cuDNN version: 9.0


Following code for reproducing:

ipdb> torch.FloatTensor([0])  
 0
